sourcesContent: import{getKeyValue as t}from"../utils/object";import{isMac as r}from"../utils/collections";import{KeyMod as o}from"./codes";export const getCtrlKeysByPlatform=()=>({CtrlCmd:r()?"metaKey":"ctrlKey",WinCtrl:r()?"ctrlKey":"metaKey"});export const getActiveModMap=r=>{const e=r.filter((r=>!!t(o,r))),l={CtrlCmd:!1,Shift:!1,Alt:!1,WinCtrl:!1};return e.forEach((r=>{const e=t(o,r);l[e]=!0})),l};
